_inspectorSnowReport.Alert:
Weather Update Sunday, December 28

Due to forecasted freezing rain and storm conditions, several ski areas and activities have been reduced for the remainder of the day. Operations are scheduled to resume Monday, December 29:

December 28 Updates and Closures:
Closed at 3:00 p.m.: North, Orchard, South,  Valley and Village main lift ski areas, including all amenities at South Base Lodge
Closed: Snow School (both Village and South ski areas)
Open: Village beginner terrain, Village Rentals, and Activity Central, including rentals and retail (Red Devil and Hillside)

Attractions:
See status below

All operations are expected to resume on Monday, December 29. Please check back here for the latest updates and travel safely.
